main.title: a cabin
main.body: the cabin has been constructed from fallen logs, sturdy but still rotting from the damp earth. it's a one room building with a fireplace and a bed, and a single window looking out over a cliff side. a rotted shotgun leans against the wall near the door.

bed.title: a bed
bed.body: the mattress is old and stained, but still soft. it's hard to imagine a family once lived here, but the sheets match and there are still pillows.

fireplace.title: a fireplace
fireplace.body: the fireplace is cold and black, but there's still a few logs nearby. the axe leaning against the wall is still sharp, and the wood is soft enough to cut through with a few swings.

window.title: a window
window.body: the window is small and square, and looks out over a cliffside. a cold wind blowing through the glass pane.
